question: I think we discussed work from home jobs for seniors earlier. Can you remind me what was the 7th job in the list you provided?

write me a good cover letter based on the following resume: COURTNEY HARRIS
Email: courtney@pensionprograms.com
LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/courtneyrharris
OBJECTIVE
Improving sales of a company’s products / services through extremely customer centric strategic
planning, data driven analysis, diligent campaign execution, and highly efficient project management.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Senior Marketing Director / Vice President April 2017 - Present
Advanced Pension Programs, Inc.
 Developed, implemented, and managed all “inbound” and “outbound” strategic marketing efforts for
Advanced Pension Programs, Inc. – resulting in $9.4M of whole life insurance policies sold ($4.6M
premiums), $6.2M of indexed annuities sold to date. Additional $4.3M of sales pending to date.
 Developed all marketing materials (print and online) and lead generation programs (inbound and
outbound) for TaxDeferredBenefits.com, and PensionPrograms.com
 Developed, implemented, and managed communication strategy for all ‘outbound’ channels – including
the first company e-newsletter, social media channels, blogs, and telemarketing scripts
 Helped design & administer 220 “qualified” and “non-qualified” defined contribution (401K) and defined
benefit (pension) retirement plans for businesses to offer employees
Sales & Marketing Consultant January 2006 – July 2017
Independent Contractor
 Engineered, developed, and managed all strategic marketing efforts responsible for launching new
division of JackStone Signs, resulting in over $5 million of pending sales orders within 9 months.
Primary duty was carefully scripted cold calling – yielding 85% positive response rate. Secondary
responsibilities included content development for brochures, direct mail, and newly launched website.
Target audience was senior level executives.
 Engineered and implemented strategic outbound marketing plan for Better WorkPlace, resulting in
89% positive response rate and total “pipeline” of $485K in total pending sales orders in first 5 months.
Target audience was senior level executives at Fortune 1000 companies.
 Engineered, developed, and implemented a viral marketing campaign for 10:3:1 Writing Studio, LLC
which included a blog article that became a “trending topic” on social media - generating over 2,800
shares and 500 comments in a month. Campaign boosted traffic to the website by 512% in 2 months.
 Directed all strategic marketing efforts responsible for launching new mobile app for ProQual-IT.
Duties included deep consumer analysis, creative direction and content development (produced online
commercial, web design and content, product testing and development, search engine optimization,
app store optimization, social media setup + management. Target audience was both businesses
(health organizations, medical professionals) and consumers
 Developed and executed email marketing campaign for Yarie, LLC that produced 255 new clients out
of 1,508 inquiries generated (17% conversion). Results included 92% email open rate and 17%
response rate. Target audience was small business owners.
 Developed and executed targeted outbound marketing campaign for Site Launcher, LLC that
produced 322 qualified sales leads out of 845 targets, (38% conversion) using a combination
telemarketing and email marketing. Results included 215% ROI and 44 new clients to date. Target
audience was small business owners.
 Engineered, developed, and managed “organic” social media campaign for Anoush Catering & LA
Banquets that received 5,145 pageviews (an increase of 2,758%), 347 “likes” (an increase of
3,755%) and a 7% conversion rate in a 7 day period. Target audience was collegiate students. Duties
included managing 2 other team members.
Marketing Director February 2001 - November 2004
Optex Inc.
 Developed all marketing materials used in 3-month online lead generation campaign - generating 64%
response rate and 125% return on marketing investment. Duties included creative design, copywriting,
production, and media planning / buying and campaign tracking
 Developed print ad campaign that was awarded "most recognizable" in brand awareness study. Duties
included creative design / direction, copywriting, and media planning / buying.
 Developed marketing materials used for 2 record setting booth attractions at international and domestic
trade shows. Duties included creative design, copywriting, and production.
EDUCATION
San Diego State University May 2000
Bachelor of Business Administration (marketing concentration)
Nova Southeastern University June 2018
Master of Business Administration (marketing concentration)
REFERENCES
• “Courtney was able to quickly grasp the benefits of our service and proposed an idea that was
so sound we implemented it right away and made it a companywide initiative. [It] resulted in
numerous meetings and a book of pending sales in the first month” (Molloy Group)
• “As a result of Courtney’s efforts, within 4 months we were able to land our first customer. And
within 9 months, we had accumulated well over $5 million in pending sales orders.”
(JackStone Signs)
• “Courtney led the script development, direction and production of an impressive 4-minute
commercial – a key component to introduce our new concept to the world” (ProQual-IT)
• “We needed to improve the sales copy on various marketing materials – including email blasts,
video scripts, and website landing pages. What we got in return was much more than we
bargained for.” (LegallyConcealed)

Based on 1-20, and because I am an account executive now at ownbackup, see my bio below, give me the I am, the reason, and how it fits me for 1-20>

##
BIO - SUMMARY
Dynamic and results-driven account executive with over a decade of experience in sales and a passion for driving business growth. Recognized for using data-driven strategies to identify market opportunities and for building and maintaining strong client relationships. Known for finding creative solutions to complex problems, and for a competitive focus on meeting and exceeding objectives and metrics. Seeking a challenging and rewarding opportunity to leverage my skills and experience in a dynamic and growing organization.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Account Executive, OwnBackup - SaaS Data Protection Platform Feb 2021 – Present •Achieved significant recognition, including being the first to reach President's Club in segment 2022, closing highest ACV in segment 2022, and being awarded a Top Performer at the Global 2023 Sales Kick-Off event. •Closed deals with 50+ new logos and consistently surpassed quotas, contributing to an increase in overall company revenue.
•Consistently driving revenue growth across numerous verticals, including Finance, Healthcare, Tech, Real Estate, and Retail.
•Built actionable sales plans that resulted in a consistent pipeline of sales opportunities, including a 20% increase in qualified leads within the first six months of 2022.
•Developed and executed rigorous multi-faceted outbound prospecting campaigns that manage all customer communication from initial discovery through close.
•Strong organizational skills to track and map processed outreach via cadences, Salesforce, and personalized calls and emails, resulting in an increased response rate to outbound communication.
•Manage a strategic portfolio of existing customers and partners, uncovering potential areas for future expansion and leading to an increase in total ACV.

I'm glad the information was helpful. Remember, it's important to advocate for yourself and your needs at work. Good luck with your conversation, and feel free to reach out if you have any further questions or concerns.

Sure, here's a revised version that is shorter and more precise:

Elderly individuals in Hong Kong may neglect their mental and emotional health due to the pressures of work and cultural influences that discourage direct communication of emotions, especially regarding delicate subjects like death. This can lead to anxiety, regret, and difficulty finding meaning in life experiences.

Workers can play a vital role in supporting elderly individuals to reflect on their past and present, find peace with regrets, and deepen relationships with loved ones through open and honest communication. Encouraging elderly individuals to make decisions about their end-of-life wishes can also help them approach death positively and with dignity.

By providing the tools for control and closure, workers can empower elderly individuals to live out their remaining years with fulfillment, purpose, and without regret.
